Data Lessons Summary List

This page will provide a comprehensive list of all data lessons submitted to the repo. This means that any page with the category of “data-lessons” will appear here ordered by date now.

Lesson 01: Why Data Management

last modified: Sep 10, 2015

Trends in data collection, storage and loss, the importance and benefits of data management, and an introduction to the data life cycle.
